Room.Name: Back Yard of Granovetter's Inn
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the yard behind Granovetter's Inn, near several small buildings.
Room.LongDescription: This small village is called Granovetter's Corner by people who live in this region, and they often prefer to do business here rather than go clear into the big city of Oceancrest. There is a blacksmith here who can fix most anything, and a no-questions-asked pawn shop.
